class.name: ShaderMaterial
class.brief_description: A material that uses a custom [Shader] program.
class.description: A material that uses a custom [Shader] program to render either items to screen or process particles. You can create multiple materials for the same shader but configure different values for the uniforms defined in the shader.

method.name: get_shader_parameter
method.description: Returns the current value set for this material of a uniform in the shader.

method.name: set_shader_parameter
method.description: Changes the value set for this material of a uniform in the shader. [b]Note:[/b] [param param] must match the name of the uniform in the code exactly.

members.member: The [Shader] program used to render this material.
